document.full_text: a federal judge fined a north carolina man $10,000 on monday and sentenced him to five years' probation for scrawling his name into a well-known petroglyph.
document.title: southwest: arizona: $10,000 fine for petroglyph graffiti
lines_and_colors: a federal judge fined a north carolina man $10,000 on monday and sentenced him to five years' probation for scrawling his name into a well-known petroglyph.
